name: VRemin (A Virtual Theremin)
description:
Hey Musician and Audio Fanboy!

Need a pause from playing Room Escape games like VR: Vacate the Room?

Ever wanted to try the Theremin without paying hundreds of Dollars?
Now you can!

Get VRemin - the Virtual Theremin.

Enter the (virtual) stage and play this old instrument with 4 Oscillators to chose from.
You could also be part of a band made of virtual instruments.

Have fun ;)Features
  • Virtual Stage - Concert Hall
  • A Virtual Theremin
  • 4 Oscillators to choose from
  • Left hand and right hand support (you can turn the instrument)
  • A Metronome
  • Concert Hall Reverb (optional)
  • More features might be added in the future
